ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a significant improvement in my melee after I got a fine steel staff.  I ve seen a lot of people going around selling fine steel weapons for around
ygData.messageBody:
I found a significant improvement in my melee after I got a fine steel
staff. I've seen a lot of people going around selling fine steel weapons
for around 10pp these days.

If you can afford it, go for a runed totem staff. About the same damage and
delay, but it includes a small mana bonus and it's magical so you can hit
ghouls. Going rate is about 20pp.


--Lim'Dul


> Date: Tue, 11 May 1999 16:21:29 -0500
> From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>Subject: Piercing or blunt?

>Hail fellow Wizards!
